title: Sweet Script
content:
Hello Everybody,

I'm trying to identify this font. I am sure I have seen it somewhere but I can't remember or identify it again...  
Thanx for your help !

[http://s24.postimg.org/kkynadr1h/130805\_0001.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418204107/http:/s24.postimg.org/kkynadr1h/130805_0001.jpg)
author: baz the baz

comments.content: There sure are fonts in that vein but this looks custom-made by hand.

Thanx for your reply, you are maybe right.  
For those interested, I have found this one which is quite approaching  
 [http://www.hypefortype.com/browse-fonts/font-categories/script/jacques-gilles.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418204107/http:/www.hypefortype.com/browse-fonts/font-categories/script/jacques-gilles.html)
